title: What is SMART Crack and what does it do?
content: SMART Crack is a powerful tool designed to visualize and analyze Rust-based smart contracts. It transforms complex Rust code into interactive graphs and tree views, making it ideal for developers, auditors, and anyone working with smart contract logic and execution.

title: Is SMART Crack free?
content: Yes, SMART Crack is a free-to-use online tool for Rust smart contract developers.

title: Is my data secure?
content: Absolutely! SMART Crack prioritizes your data privacy. All processing, including Rust code analysis and visualization, happens locally in your browser. Your code is never sent to our servers and remains completely private.

title: Can I convert Rust code to other formats using SMART Crack?
content: Yes, SMART Crack supports converting Rust code into structured visual outputs, such as dependency graphs, execution flow diagrams, and JSON representations for easier analysis.

title: What kind of data formats are supported?
content: SMART Crack supports raw Rust smart contract files and can also process related JSON files for contract testing or input/output visualization.

title: What size of data can I visualize?
content: SMART Crack supports Rust files up to approximately 300 KB. The actual size may vary depending on the complexity of the code and your hardware.

title: Can I export the generated graphs?
content: Yes, you can export the generated graphs as PNG, JPEG, or SVG files for sharing or documentation.
